evidence.title: README (segment 1)
evidence.excerpt:
GVM (Global Version Manager)

GVM is a programming language version manager, like `nvm`, but extensible to support all programming languages.

evidence.title: README (segment 2)
evidence.excerpt: ![Workflow ci](https://github.com/toodofun/gvm/actions/workflows/gvm.yml/badge.svg) [![Go Report Card](https://goreportcard.com/badge/github.com/toodofun/gvm)](https://goreportcard.com/report/github.com/toodofun/gvm) [![release](https://img.shields.io/github/release-pre/toodofun/gvm.svg)](https://github.com/toodofun/gvm/releases) [![Docker Pulls](https://img.shields.io/docker/pulls/toodo/gvm.svg?maxAge=604800)](https://hub.docker.com/r/toodo/gvm/) [![GitHub License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/toodofun/gvm)](https://github.com/toodofun/gvm) ![GitHub go.mod Go version](https://img.shields.io/github/go-mod/go-version/toodofun/gvm?logo=go) [![GitHub Downloads (all assets, all releases)](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/toodofun/gvm/total)](https://github.com/MR5356/toodofun/gvm) [![Test Coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/toodofun/gvm/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/toodofun/gvm)

evidence.title: README (segment 4)
evidence.excerpt: Available Commands: add Add a new addon to the GVM completion Generate the autocompletion script for the specified shell current Show Current version of a language help Help about any command install Install a specific version of a language ls List installed versions of language ls-remote List remote versions of language set-language Set default application language, supported languages: en, zh ui Run in the terminal UI uninstall Uninstall a specific version of a language use Set default versions of language version Print version information

evidence.title: README (segment 5)
evidence.excerpt: ## ü§ò  Features - Manage multiple versions of various programming languages (e.g., Go, Node, Java, etc.; more coming soon) - Easy installation, uninstallation, and switching between language versions - List both locally installed and remotely available versions for each language - Operate via both Command Line Interface (CLI) and Terminal User Interface (TUI) - Set default versions for each language - Shell autocompletion for faster command input - Cross-platform support, with Docker images and binary releases - Extensible architecture‚Äîeasy to add support for new languages

evidence.title: README (segment 6)
evidence.excerpt: ## üêç  Supported Programming Languages - [x] Golang - [x] Node - [x] Java (zulu) - [x] Python - [ ] C# - [ ] C++/C

evidence.title: README (segment 7)
evidence.excerpt: ## üê≥  Docker Container ### Release ``` docker pull toodo/gvm docker run -it -e TERM=xterm toodo/gvm ui ``` üîî **Note:** The above example runs the `gvm ui` command in an interactive terminal. To run `gvm` against other compatible servers, or to enter the container interactively for debugging or inspection, use:

evidence.title: README (segment 8)
evidence.excerpt: Download the appropriate version for your platform from the [releases page](https://github.com/toodofun/gvm/releases).
